article_title: U.S. Supreme Court hears from its ‘friends’ about same-sex marriage
article_text:

article_metadata.description: U.S. Supreme Court justices have a lot of reading to do — more than 7,500 pages — before the April?28 hearing on pivotal same-sex-marriage cases. The cases, including two from Ohio, have attracted enormous attention because the Supreme Court’s decision, expected this summer, could lead to same-sex marriage being legal in all 50 states.
